snippet: Cadillac, with solid cars like the CTS and ATS, has regained its relevance in the luxury-car market, and now Lincoln is attempting its own comeback with the new MKZ. But will it be enough?
abstract: Lincoln is attempting to revitalize its luxury car brand with 2013 MKZ midsize sedan, first of four luxury models it will be unveiling over four years.
lead_paragraph: Cadillac, with solid cars like the CTS and ATS, has regained its relevance in the luxury-car market, and now Lincoln is attempting its own comeback with the new MKZ. But will it be enough?

headline.seo: Lincoln, Seeking a Reboot, Gets Some New Hardware
headline.main: Lincoln, Seeking a Reboot, Gets Some New Hardware
headline.print_headline: Lincoln, Seeking a Reboot, Gets Some New Hardware
